DOC.brief_summary: The Mapping Transvenous Phrenic Nerve Stimulation Study ( MAPS ) conduct evaluate feasibility transvascular stimulation phrenic nerve via EP catheter advance great vein .
DOC.brief_title: Mapping Acute Transvenous Phrenic Nerve Stimulation Study
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose The Mapping Transvenous Phrenic Nerve Stimulation Study ( MAPS ) conduct evaluate feasibility transvascular stimulation phrenic nerve via EP catheter advance great vein . Study Design This prospective , non-randomized , acute feasibility study .
DOC.criteria: Subjects older 18 year age Subject undergoing cardiac catheterization involve right heart catheterization and/or EP procedure and/or device implant . Subjects willing able give inform consent Subject previously implant transvenous lead , still present vein study . Subject evidence phrenic nerve palsy . Subject chronic obstructive pulmonary disease . Subject spinal cord stimulator . Subject need receive drug might interfere patient perception . Subjects medical condition would prevent study participation Subjects pregnant , nursing , child bear potential reliable form birth control Subjects enrol concurrent study could confound result study Subject unable unwilling participate study procedure
